text: Francis Davidson Fraser, better known as "Mad" Frankie Fraser (13 December 1923 â€“ 26 November 2014), was an English criminal and gang member. He spent 42 years in prison for numerous offences including burglary and assault. Fraser was born in Lambeth, South London, England. Fraser was shot in the head in 1991. He died from complications of leg surgery in Lambeth, South London, England, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Personal website with biography and details of gangland tours Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:British burglars Category:British crime victims Category:British people convicted of assault Category:Criminals from London Category:People from the London Borough of Lambeth Category:Deaths from surgical complications
title: Frankie Fraser
